item.title: Graffiti in Finland Street, 21st December
item.description:
Someone has painted graffiti on a wall along Finland Street close to Greenland Dock cut. Please can it be removed as soon as possible so that it doesn’t attract more of the same. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-8, Finland Street, Rotherhithe, Greater London

item.title: Drain on the even side of Stembridge blocked with silt, 21st December
item.description:
This is an annual issue. The grate to the drain is fully blocked with organic matter due to the fact that none of the leaves in the gutter have been cleared post autumn fall. Now the leaves have decomposed to compost and the drain now totally blocked
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stembridge Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous protruding metal from vehicle, 21st December
item.description:
Parked part road part grass verge since 10/11/25 after an accident, dangerous protruding metal work from vehicle, although technically does not require MOT the vehicle is not road worthy so should not be left at current location
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Cray Valley Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On-street fly tipping, 21st December
item.description:
This street has had constant fly tipping for months, maybe up to a year. It gets collected but the next morning or later the same day it fills up again. There is a poster saying ‘we are watching you’ with fly tipping consequences but it is to no avail. There needs to be a greater deterrent / cameras / officers or preventative measures such as educational leaflets/ bins made available. I fear rodent infestations due to this.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Conway Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Community bin not collected, 21st December
item.description:
This bin has been on the pavement for weeks. It has a broken wheel and is burnt through at the bottom, but has still been used for all sorts of rubbish. It now smells.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Amblecote Road, Chinbrook, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
